Customizable Calendar: Create a calendar that can be customized to suit individual preferences. Users could choose the size, layout, and design of the calendar, as well as the background and images used.
Smart Calendar: Integrate a smart calendar with artificial intelligence that can analyze user's past schedules and suggest future events based on their habits and preferences.
3D Calendar: Develop a 3D calendar that can be displayed on a wall or stand upright. This would allow for a more immersive experience, with each month represented as a unique 3D model.
Virtual Calendar: Create a virtual calendar that can be accessed through a virtual reality headset. This would allow users to interact with the calendar in a more immersive and interactive way.
Personalized Calendar: Develop a calendar that can be personalized with photos, videos, or other content. This would allow users to create a calendar that reflects their interests and memories.
